debuff.name: Weak
debuff.description: The target deals 20% less attack DMG.

debuff.name: Bleed
debuff.description: Target loses 15 HP when playing a card.

debuff.name: Fear
debuff.description: Whenever this unit uses an Attack card, shuffle a Confused into its draw pile.

debuff.name: Death Mark
debuff.description: Whenever your opponent plays an Attack card, the target takes 13 DMG per Energy spent.

debuff.name: Hex
debuff.description: Whenever the target uses a non-Attack card, shuffle a Confused into its draw pile.

debuff.name: Fragile
debuff.description: This unit gains 20% less Shield from Abilities.

debuff.name: Poison
debuff.description: The target loses 3 HP per stack at the start of its turn. Stacks are reduced by 1. Cap: 30 stacks.

debuff.name: Sleep
debuff.description: The target cannot use Abilities. If it's attacked, remove Sleep.

debuff.name: Disarm
debuff.description: The target cannot use Attack Abilities.

debuff.name: Doubt
debuff.description: The target gains 20% less HP from Healing.

debuff.name: Vulnerable
debuff.description: The target receives 20% more attack DMG.

buff.name: Taunt
buff.description: The target is always targeted by enemy attack abilities.

buff.name: Bubble
buff.description: Block 5 DMG per stack. Max: 3 stacks. Turn into Bubble Bomb upon reaching 3 stacks

buff.name: Bubble Bomb
buff.description: The next attack explodes Bubble Bomb and deals 20 DMG to all Enemies.

buff.name: Rage
buff.description: Plus 2 DMG per Rage stack. Enter Fury Form at 10 Rage stacks.

buff.name: Fury
buff.description: Gain 1 Energy when transformed. Deal double damage until end of turn.

buff.name: DMG Boost
buff.description: The target has Attack DMG increased by 1 per stack.

buff.name: Healing Boost
buff.description: Increase healing card effects to this unit by 1 HP per stack.

buff.name: Cleanser
buff.description: Each stack negates 1 debuff applied to the target.

buff.name: Feather
buff.description: When Axie does a non-multihit attack, consume all Feather stacks to deal 2 bonus DMG per stack and heal 2 HP per stack. Max : 10 stack.

buff.name: Leaf
buff.description: Regen 5 HP at the end of your turn. Max stack: 5

buff.name: Stealth
buff.description: The target cannot be targeted directly. If it uses a card, remove Stealth.

buff.name: Meditate
buff.description: Meditate for 2  turns. If attacked while Meditating, awake and gain 3 Rage. If not, Cleanse 1 debuff and gain 1 Energy after effect ends.

curse.name: Jinx
curse.description: Unplayable. Ethereal. At the end of your turn, your furthest Axie takes 15 damage.

curse.name: Void
curse.description: Unplayable. Ethereal. When you draw 1 or more Void, lose 1 Energy.

curse.name: Burn
curse.description: Unplayable. Ethereal. At the end of your turn, all allies take 8 damage.

curse.name: Blackmail
curse.description: Apply Taunt to your furthest Axie for 2 turns. If this is not used, put it onto the top of your draw pile.

toolcards.name: Lumbershield
toolcards.description: Retain. Target any ally. Banish. Shield for 12, 0 energy.

toolcards.name: Strawberry
toolcards.description: Retain. Target any ally. Banish. Heal for 60, 0 energy.

toolcards.name: Pure Water
toolcards.description: Retain. Target any ally. Banish. Heal for 6, 0 energy.

summon.name: Clover
summon.description: Plant | 35 HP | When your turn starts, randomly grant 1~2 Leafs to your Axies. Clover disappears after 4 leafs are granted.

summon.name: Robin
summon.description: Bird | 18 HP | Teammates deal 16 more DMG. Lose 8 HP when your turn ends.

summon.name: Mavis
summon.description: Bird | 18 HP | When your turn starts (after card drawing), Mavis reduces 1 Energy of a random Attack card. Lose 8 HP when your turn ends.

summon.name: Mushroom
summon.description: Plant | 18 HP | When your turn ends, this Mushroom restores 24 HP to your most injured ally and loses 8 HP.

keywords.name: Initial
keywords.description: The first card played in a turn.

keywords.name: Banish
keywords.description: Remove the card from your deck until the end of battle.

keywords.name: Scry
keywords.description: Look at the top cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.

keywords.name: Innate
keywords.description: Start each battle with this card in your hand.

keywords.name: Clean
keywords.description: Remove debuffs from target, up to 5 stacks.

keywords.name: Dispel
keywords.description: Remove 1 buff from target, up to 5 stacks

keywords.name: Steal
keywords.description: Deal pure DMG and gain HP.

keywords.name: Retain
keywords.description: Do not discard this card at the end of your turn
